transcript:
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Good morning, Jinsi aanu IndiaMART Noida office-il ninna?
Customer: Aa njaan avide contact cheythu Kipsan ennu paranja aale.
Executive: Kipsane contact cheyyendha kaaryamilla. Kipsan alla ningalude service handle cheyyunnathu IndiaMART-inte head office-il ninnaane.
Customer: Aa, aa, okke.
Executive: Okke. Appo pinne aaraanennu parayaamo? Perentha?
Customer: Athulya.
Executive: Athulya. Athulya ente peru Jinsi. Njaan IndiaMART Noida office-il ninnaanu vilikkunnathu. Ningal ee account Bill Tex Support-inte service IndiaMART-inte Noida office-il ninnaanu handle cheyyunnathu. Athulyaykku, Athulyaykku ethokke language comfort aanu? Only Malayalam maathrame ariyathullu?
Customer: Aa, athe.
Executive: Okke, okke. Entha ethra naala ivide join cheythittu?
Customer: Randu maasam.
Executive: Randu maasam aayille? Ithinu munne ithu ee account aayirunnu handle cheythondirunnathu?
Customer: Athariyilla.
Executive: Ariyilla, athalle? Okke, appo seller panel-inte concern aano alle? Ningalkku entha pinne ithu venam?
Executive: Ippo enthaanu requirement? Namukku enthaanu IndiaMART-inte portal-il ninnu ningalkku ariyendathu?
Customer: Athu njaan annu avare vilichappo avaru parannu thannu, clear aayi.
Executive: Entho?
Customer: Clear aayi. Enikku requirement clear aayi. Oru doubt undaayirunnu. Appo athu njaan contact cheythappo connect aayillaayirunnu. Appo njaan Kipsan ennulla number-ilekku vilichappo connect cheythappo clear aayi.
Executive: Okke, ippo concern onnumille?
Customer: Illa, illa.
Executive: Okke, Athulya actually Kipsan alla ningalude account manager. Appo ente peru Jinsi Thomas. Ningalude account manager-inte per Chithranshi aanu. Athu dashboard-il undallo peru. Athu onnu login cheythittu angottu vilichirikkane. Kipsan ennu vechchaal vere department, sales department aanu. Ningal service eduthu kazhinjathinu shesham eppozhum avare vilichu kazhinjaal avarkku help cheyyaan patti ennu varuthille.
Customer: Aa, aa.
Executive: Appo ningalude aa dashboard-inakathu oru number undu Chithranshi. Chithranshiyude manager aanu Jinsi Thomas. Appo ee seller panel-inte issues enthengilum undengil chothicholu njaan athinte explain cheythu tharaame.
Customer: Okke, njaan enthengilum undengil contact cheyyaam.
Executive: Hello? Aa, ini neelavil enthengilum undengil contact cheyyaam.
Executive: Ippo problem onnumille?
Customer: Illa, illa.
Executive: Enthaayirunnu concern ennu parayaamo?
Customer: Athu notification vannillaayirunnu. Appo athu ready aayi.
Executive: Okke, okke. Notification ippo correct aayo?
Customer: Aa, ippo correct aayi.
Executive: Okke, namukku evide ninnokkeyaanu requirement vendathu? Ippo main aayi ningalkku evide ninnokkeyaanu? Keralathil ninnu maathram mathiyo business atho Tamil Nadu, Karnataka evide ninnokke venam? Atho India-kkathu mottham venamo?
Customer: Keralathil ninnu mottham venam.
Executive: Kerala maathram ningal main aayi focus cheyyunnathu, alle?
Executive: Okke, Athulya marketing-ilaano handle cheyyunnathu? Atho lead eduthittu saarinu kodukkuvo? Enganaanu Athulyayude responsibility avide?
Customer: Lead eduthittu calling.
Executive: Lead eduthittu saarinu forward cheyyuvaanalle?
Customer: Alla, ivide ninnu direct calling.
Executive: Call cheyyum. Lead eduthittu baarine connect cheyyunnathu Athulya thanneyaanu, alle?
Customer: Umm.
Executive: Okke, enganeyundu overall response okke? Ethra nerathe, ethra nerathilulla lead aanu kittunnathu? Overall athu use cheyyunnathil enthengilum budhimuttundo? Alert varille allaathe vere enthengilum concern undo?
Customer: Illa, illa, illa.
Executive: Value okke proper aayi varum, alle?
Customer: Aa, varunnundu.
Executive: Okke, ippo namukku pinne ippo thanne recent aayittu oru lead kidakkunndu.
Executive: Eppozhum nallathupole recent relevant refresh refresh cheythondirikkuaanengil namukku recent aayittu lead vannu kidakkum. Tiruppur okke aanu kollam? Tiruppur okke nammal edukkuvo ippo?
Customer: Illa.
Executive: Illa. Nammal only ithu maathrame ullu, alle? Kerala maathrame ullu.
Executive: Okke, Keralathil ninnu nokki kazhinju kazhinjaal ippo Thiruvananthapurathunnu kidappundu lead. Yesterday-ile lead aanu.
Customer: Aa.
Executive: Pinne contact eduthaayirunnu, alle?
Executive: Okke, appo ningal ee video meeting-inte request aanu vittathu. Njaan video meeting cheyyanam ennundengil njaan link share cheythittu demo tharaam.
Customer: Illa, Athulyaykku video meeting ippo venda.
Executive: Entho? Ippozhenthaalum venda. Problem sort out aavatte. Appo njaan ee ningal oru IndiaMART-inte TrustSeal-il aanu call cheythathu. Appo aa issues sort out aayi pinne Kipsane vilichu nannu Kipsan ithu pinne ningalude complaint aayittu raise cheyyippichathu.
Executive: Appo ini direct enne vilikkaavu, ketto. Unnecessary complaint aakki kazhinju kazhinjaal automatically ningalude enquiry flow low aayipokume.
Executive: Okke, appo njaan ee pinne mail vittekkaam, account manager-inte number vittekkaam, detail vittekkaam, ente number-um vittekkaam, WhatsApp group-um create cheytheykaame.
Customer: Aa, aayikkotte.
Executive: Ithu Athulyayude number aano?
Customer: Athe, athe. Ee number aanu use cheyyunnathu.
Executive: Okke, appo njaan ee oru ningalude pinne concern close cheyyuvaanu. Appo issues sort out aayengil satisfied uthekkane. Njaan WhatsApp group create cheythittu WhatsApp-il athukooda enthengilum problem undengil angottu just voice message Malayalam-thil vittaalum mathi. Okke, njaan njaan pinne group-inakathu add aayikkolaam.
Executive: Okke, appo ente personal number-um njaan tharaame.
Customer: Aa, aayikkotte.
Executive: Okke, okke. Appo enthengilum concern undengil future-il okke njaan ippo ithu ee issues sort out cheyyuvaane. Leads, value-de, enquiry ellaam thanne okke.
Executive: Okke, okke. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Notification was not being received.

- Customer contacted Kipsan for issue resolution.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified Kipsan is not account manager.

- Notification issue resolved.

- Offered support via WhatsApp group.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share contact details via email.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- notification, leads, account manager, support
